snippet: Cody Ross, filling in for David Ortiz, hit three-run homers in consecutive innings and Felix Doubront pitched six solid innings, carrying the Red Sox to a 10-1 victory over the White Sox.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Boston Red Sox beat the Chicago White Sox, 10-1; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Cody Ross, filling in for David Ortiz, hit three-run homers in consecutive innings and Felix Doubront pitched six solid innings, carrying the Red Sox to a 10-1 victory over the White Sox.

headline.seo: Ross Hits Two Homers in Red Sox’ Rout
headline.main: With Ortiz Injured, Ross Provides Two Home Runs in Red Sox’ Rout
headline.print_headline: With Ortiz Injured, Ross Provides Two Home Runs in Red Sox’ Rout
